Class ClientList

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Manages list of clients.

    • Field Detail

      • instance

        private static final ClientList instance
        The only instance of this class.
        See Also:
        getInstance()

      • clients

        private java.util.List<ClientInfo> clients
        Keeps the list of of clients. Clients are stored in the same order, which they have been registered in.

      • numbers

        private java.util.Set<PhoneNumber> numbers
        List of client phone numbers. The list is used by addClient(ru.avalon.javapp.devj120.avalontelecom.models.PhoneNumber, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) method to check, that specified phone number is not used. This set is updated simultaneously with clients list, when clients are added or removed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientList

        private ClientList()
        Prevents instance creation out of the class.

    • Method Detail

      • addClient

        public void addClient​(PhoneNumber number,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String address)
        Adds client with specified attributes. Creates instance of ClientInfo (see ClientInfo(PhoneNumber, String, String)) while adding new client.
        Parameters:
        number - client phone number
        name - client name
        address - client address
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If some client with specified phone number has already been registered.

      • remove

        public void remove​(int index)
        Removes client with the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - index of a client to be removed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= getClientsCount()).

      • getClientsCount

        public int getClientsCount()
        Returns amount of clients, kept by the list.
        Returns:
        Number of clients, kept by the list.

      • getClientInfo

        public ClientInfo getClientInfo​(int index)
        Returns information about a client with specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - client index, which data is retrieved
        Returns:
        ClientInfo
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= getClientsCount()).

      • getInstance

        public static ClientList getInstance()
        Returns the only instance of this class.
